segments.text: It's very kind of you to show me around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . What would you like to see first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's walk around the lake first , shall we ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's the first time I've been here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will take you to Li River after walking around here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's wonderful ! I have heard the scene of Li River is beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you'll be in a different world there .
segments.speaker: S2
